attributes.action: give funding for a monorail in Dundee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dundee badly needs a monorail. It's current public transport system is in a mess and simply does not have enough stops. A monorail would help relive this stress. It would also become a tourist attraction as monorails are pretty rare. Furthermore it could be incorporated into the quayside redevelopment plans and help to further rejuvenate the area.
